title: Alistar
body: Ok so not sure if riot have made alistar easy to combo with or I've just gotten good at timings cause just did a game missed 2 combos 1 because q was on cd and didn't notice, the 2nd was from a glitch I wd zed then qd he got ccd by the q but he was pushed away I think this may have been because I was between a destroyed tower and the wall

replies.body: They did that awhile ago for the bronzers.
